examples: We discuss current scientific advancements and discoveries in science class.
We discussed what punishment should be given to the boys.
We discussed our favorite movie scenes with our friends after watching a film.
The doctor made a call to the patient to discuss the test results.
The parents attended the school meeting to discuss their child's progress.
words.defineEn: to talk or have a discussion about something with someone
words.defineVi: để nói chuyện hoặc có một cuộc thảo luận về một cái gì đó với một ai đó

examples: The hiker enjoyed the scenic beauty of the river's gentle bends.
The beauty of nature is evident in the vibrant colors of a sunset.
As they say, beauty draws with a single hair.
The floral arrangements adorned the altar, adding beauty to the church ceremony.
You can add a touch of exotic beauty to your garden by planting a cycad.
words.defineEn: the quality of being attractive or pleasing, particularly to the eye
words.defineVi: chất lượng hấp dẫn hoặc dễ chịu, đặc biệt là đối với mắt

examples: US President Joe Biden got the clean bill of health on Friday after a detailed physical examination.
She felt aches and pains in her body after a long day of physical activity.
Sarah is strong as an oak, effortlessly conquering physical challenges with her robust and unyielding strength.
If you all work in the same physical space, working as a team is easy as anything.
Lisa hits the gym regularly to stay in shape and maintain her physical fitness.
words.defineEn: related to the body rather than the mind
words.defineVi: liên quan đến cơ thể hơn là tâm trí

examples: The restaurant featured a signature dish of slow-roasted brisket.
The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
The menu featured a creative dish of beef plate tacos.
The farm-to-table restaurant featured a signature dish of picnic shoulder with creamy sauce.
The magazine features interviews with musicians and reviews of new albums.
words.defineEn: an important or distinctive aspect of something
words.defineVi: một khía cạnh quan trọng hoặc đặc biệt của một cái gì đó

examples: Its skin feels really smooth.
The bite had scarcely broken the skin.
The bite had scarcely broken the skin.
The milk skin gives a unique texture to the homemade pudding.
The crispy skin of the parson's nose offered a satisfying crunch with each bite.
words.defineEn: the thin layer of tissue that covers the body of a person or an animal
words.defineVi: lớp mô mỏng bao phủ cơ thể của một người hoặc động vật

examples: Keep your hair on.
Her hair reaches down to her waist.
His hair reached down to the middle of his back.
My grandmother's hair is gray.
Short hair really becomes you.
words.defineEn: the thin thread-like things that grow on our head
words.defineVi: những thứ giống như sợi chỉ mọc trên đầu chúng ta

examples: The gymnast effortlessly bent her body into a graceful arch during her routine.
Under stress, the body produces adrenalin.
The doctor examined her body to check for any signs of illness or injury.
The demonstrators marched in a body to the main square.
He dedicated himself body and soul to the education of young men.
words.defineEn: our or an animal's hands, legs, head, and every other part together
words.defineVi: tay, chân, đầu và mọi bộ phận khác của chúng ta hoặc động vật cùng với nhau

examples: A better teacher would have licked him into shape.
Wow, Jim has really gotten in shape lately.
We learn about shapes and measurements in our math class.
The ugli fruit's bright orange color and unique shape make it a fun and eye-catching addition to fruit platters.
Hey, don't get all bent out of shape!
words.defineEn: the outer form or edges of something or someone
words.defineVi: hình thức bên ngoài hoặc các cạnh của một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: He takes size 5 boots.
The family has grown in size recently.
What size shoes do you take?
Tortelloni's substantial size makes them a better choice compared to the bite-sized tortellini.
Of course we'll change it for a larger size, Madam.
words.defineEn: how small or big something is; the amount of something
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó nhỏ hay lớn như thế nào; số lượng của một cái gì đó

examples: My father has brown eyes.
The woman has eyes like a hawk!
A vase on a side table caught his eye.
The actor's intense bedroom eyes added an extra layer of allure to his performance.
The intense gaze from across the room, eyes on stalks, left no doubt about his attraction.
words.defineEn: a body part on our face that we have two of and use for seeing
words.defineVi: một bộ phận cơ thể trên khuôn mặt của chúng ta mà chúng ta có hai và sử dụng để nhìn

examples: It really gets up my nose.
She wrinkled her nose at the taste of broccoli.
She wrinkled her nose at the strong smell.
He had a nose for trouble and a brilliant tactical mind.
She has a good nose for a bargain.
words.defineEn: the body part that is in the middle of our face and we use to smell and breathe
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể ở giữa khuôn mặt của chúng tôi và chúng tôi sử dụng để ngửi và thở

examples: Watch your mouth!
My mouth felt completely dry.
The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
The smell of the burgers on the grill made Jake's mouth water.
People held handkerchiefs over their mouths.
words.defineEn: our body part that we use for eating, speaking, or breathing
words.defineVi: bộ phận cơ thể của chúng ta mà chúng ta sử dụng để ăn, nói hoặc thở

examples: The vibrant green color of perilla leaves adds an attractive touch to any dish.
Guys automatically become less attractive when they break Priscian's head.
The food packaging film had a color retention agent to prevent discoloration and maintain the attractive appearance of it.
The sight of the attractive lifeguard on the beach was enough to make Tom feel like he needed a cold shower to calm his racing heart.
A sinfully attractive man who knows what he wants, Rafael seduces Cherri before she knows what hits her.
words.defineEn: pleasing or appealing to the senses
words.defineVi: làm hài lòng hoặc hấp dẫn các giác quan

examples: Therefore, while they may represent a port in a storm, they are fundamentally unattractive business models.
Some people may find tattoos beautiful and appealing, while others may find them unattractive, illustrating that beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
And that is a really unattractive place to be.
It also made them physically unattractive.
Its dark colors would be considered unattractive for a koi, but it's perfect protection against predators in the wild.
Reckless youth makes rueful age.
Buying a house shouldn't be a castle in the air for the youth.
The group of teenagers is savoring their salad days, making memories and embracing the joy of youth before responsibilities take over.
Some people worry that teenagers are making bad choices, but it's important to remember that youth will have its fling.
Art is long and life is short, my mentor reminded me, encouraging me to use my youth to develop the skills and knowledge I would need for a lifetime of painting.
words.defineEn: a young man or a teenage boy
words.defineVi: một thanh niên hoặc một cậu bé tuổi teen

examples: Health services are lining the drug companies’ pockets, according to the report.
The presence of green algae in water bodies can indicate the health and balance of the ecosystem.
Years of smoking and drinking has taken a toll on her health.
Support your thyroid health by incorporating bladderwrack supplements into your daily routine.
Public education campaigns highlight potential health risks of consuming pink slime products.
words.defineEn: the general condition of a person's mind or body
words.defineVi: tình trạng chung của tâm trí hoặc cơ thể của một người
